summary: Spain, XVII century. Two students, Felipe and Pastrano, who left an annoying university, decide to look for happiness in Madrid.
cast: Margarita Terekhova|Emmanuil Vitorgan|Nikolay Karachentsov|Svetlana Toma|Vladislav Strzhelchik|Ekaterina Raykina|Pavel Kadochnikov|Oleg Vidov|Pyotr Kadochnikov|Ye. Kamenskaya|L. Prokopenko|Roman Furman|Aleksandr Khazin
title: Blagochestivaya Marta
